rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {1250, M60018}

unitName: Nursing practice in the Australian healthcare context
description: This unit is offered concurrently with NUR5113 Nursing in the Australian Context for registered nurses with International nursing qualifications. A focus on principles of clinical leadership, therapeutic and professional communication, multidisciplinary team work, and clinical decision making will facilitate transition to the Australian nursing context. The unit is learner cantered engaging the student in critical reflection, appraisal and application of evidence for practice in relationship to the role of the nurse in a variety of clinical nursing settings.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
